articles.author: HT News Desk
articles.title: Big blow to Nitish Kumar's JD(U) as Centre rejects Bihar special status demand - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Janata Dal (United), a key NDA ally with 12 Lok Sabha MPs, has been demanding special status to Bihar. | Latest News India
articles.content: The Narendra Modi-led NDA government on Monday said that the special status to Bihar cannot be granted as per the Inter-Ministerial Group (IMG) report 2012, dealing a big blow to Nitish Kumar's Janat… [+2064 chars]
